lines.text: Do you know what a meteor is?
Sure, it's a falling star that falls to earth.
Well, Hedorah (the Smog Monster) attached itself to one of those stars.
In each creature there's a weakness.
Hedorah's only sludge... he can be dried.
[Godzilla and Hedorah battle it out on top of Mount Fuji]
There's no place else to go and pretty soon we'll all be dead, so forget it! Enjoy yourself! Let's sing and dance while we can! Come on, blow your mind!
It probably came from a sticky, dark planet far, far away. Now go to sleep.
